The researcher is the liars of those before them, that is, before the disbelievers of the Mecca from the disbelievers of the nations, the righteous, the people of Noah, the return of them, and their rituals, and the fools to the absence of the symptoms of the symptoms It was a denier, that is, my denial of them by removing the torment, that is, it was on the end of the hollow and the anger, and this is the repetition of the affirmation of the division, do not deny them in the same way.Speech from the exaggeration in calling the Messenger of God ï·º and tightening the supply of his people who are not hidden.
